notifications" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="290" y="310" width="120" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="wr6T2VF4gnIS3RxcP0Pz-11" value="users email/phone" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="145" y="320" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="wr6T2VF4gnIS3RxcP0Pz-12" value="1. set up websocket events for each notification type.<br>(These would be function that get triggered based on chosen events.)<br><br>2. Can access the list of registered addresses and corresponding user details.<br><br>3. Triggers the send notification anytime a registered event occurs on the users address." style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="550" y="170" width="230" height="230" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.div:
1. set up websocket events for each notification type.
(These would be function that get triggered based on chosen events.)
2. Can access the list of registered addresses and corresponding user details.
3. Triggers the send notification anytime a registered event occurs on the users address.
